articles.title: Conservatives call for tax relief for GM worker severance packages
articles.description: OTTAWA — The Opposition Conservatives are calling on the federal Liberal government to reduce taxes on severance packages for laid-off General Motors workers in Ingersoll, Ont. articles.title: This popular diet was linked to a much lower stroke risk
articles.description: A long-term study found that women who closely followed a Mediterranean diet had a much lower risk of stroke.
